controls.label: Is the customer unable to establish identity using standard customer identification requirements under Chapter 4?
controls.detail-label: Describe the reason why standard identification requirements cannot be met

controls.label: Is the customer unable to produce or provide necessary identity evidence due to COVID-19 Pandemic measures?
controls.detail-label: Describe which COVID-19 measures are preventing identity evidence provision

controls.label: Are you accepting a self-attestation from the customer certifying that identity information provided is true and correct?
controls.detail-label: Describe your process for obtaining and documenting customer self-attestation

controls.label: Are you applying appropriate levels of ongoing customer due diligence to identify, mitigate and manage ML/TF risks associated with self-attested identities?
controls.detail-label: Describe your ongoing due diligence procedures for self-attested customers

controls.label: Do you have controls to ensure you do not rely on a self-attestation if you know or have reason to believe it is incorrect or misleading?
controls.detail-label: Describe your verification and validation controls for self-attestations

controls.label: Are you accepting copies of documents (rather than originals or certified copies) due to COVID-19 Pandemic measures when verification based on originals or certified copies cannot be completed?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based systems and controls for accepting document copies during COVID-19 measures

controls.label: Do you have documented criteria defining what constitutes 'COVID-19 Pandemic measures' for your organisation?
controls.detail-label: Describe your definition and scope of COVID-19 Pandemic measures (including government measures, your own reasonable measures, and third-party measures)

groups.title: Gatekeeping: Standard Identification Unable to be Established
groups.description: Determine whether conditions are met to use alternative identity proofing processes under rules 4.15.1 or 4.15.1A.

groups.title: Alternative Verification Processes
groups.description: Select and apply alternative identity proofing methods in accordance with risk-based systems and controls.

groups.title: Self-Attestation Documentation
groups.description: Process for accepting and documenting customer self-attestation when alternative proofing processes cannot establish identity.

groups.title: Ongoing Due Diligence for Self-Attested Identities
groups.description: Apply appropriate ongoing customer due diligence to identify, mitigate and manage ML/TF risks where customer identity was established via self-attestation.

groups.title: Self-Attestation Validation Controls
groups.description: Implement controls to reject or cease reliance on self-attestations if known or reasonably believed to be incorrect or misleading.

groups.title: Document Verification Flexibility During COVID-19
groups.description: Accept document copies instead of originals or certified copies where COVID-19 Pandemic measures prevent standard verification.

groups.title: Definition of COVID-19 Pandemic Measures
groups.description: Document and apply the definition of 'COVID-19 Pandemic measures' including government measures, your reasonable measures, and third-party reasonable measures.
